function NPC_8895000:Init(NPCID) NPC_8895000.BP_Bag = 1 NPC_8895000.TALENT_Pain = 210931609 -- 뿔에 맞으면 쓰는 탤런트 NPC_8895000.LIMIT_BParts = NPC_8895000.MaxHP*0.8 end
function NPC_8895000:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) -- hp 70이하일 때 브레이커블 파츠가 확율적으로 부숴진다
local ThisNPC = HitInfo.Victim
if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( NPC_8895000.BP_Bag ) then return HitInfo end
if( ThisNPC:GetHP() <= NPC_8895000.LIMIT_BParts ) and ( math.random( 0, 1 ) == 1 ) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8895000.TALENT_Pain ) ThisNPC:BreakPart(1, HitInfo.Attacker) end
return HitInfo end
